#D.Tube is the first crypto-decentralized video platform, built on top of the STEEM Blockchain and the IPFS peer-to-peer network.
- https://d.tube/

#Paratii project is developing a video player upon p2p streaming and decentralized service providers to put revenue 100% in control of producers.
- https://paratii.video/
